name: Double Blind (b3agz)
description:
You wake to find yourself in a strange room with no memory of how you got there. Supposedly, you are there to test a new advanced type of AI, and your isolation and memory loss is just part of the test.

But is there more going on than you're being told?

The test runs for seven days, and in that time you must make decisions that will determine how the experiment—indeed, how your life—will play out.

How to Play

Simply put, your objective is to end the experiment. How you do that is entirely up to you, but there are several ways that it can go.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move and your mouse to look around and interact. Explore your new surroundings and talk to your enigmatic companion. Your choices matter.

Credits

All coding and artwork, voice acting, and the concept are by b3agz. All music and sound effects were created by BEATandDELETE. The game was created using Unity 2021 and the artwork was made using Adobe Photoshop and b3agz' phone camera.

Pirate Software Game Jam

This game is an entry in Pirate Software's April 2023 game jam. The theme of the jam was "Against the Rules", and we were not allowed to use pre-made assets in our project.
